title: A request to Rito
body:
Whenever you do one of these IP weekends or anything that requires teamups or whatever, can you disable that damn invite list.

I am sick of getting invites every 5 fucking minutes because of this stupid feature.

Sure it's a great feature when we don't have an IP weekend and is actually used legitmately, but honestly, i'm just getting spammed invites to everything.

And no i'm not actually in a chat room at this point and i'm still getting at least 1 invite every 5 minutes i'm not spending in queue/in game (in fact i got 3 writing this.)

replies.body: Who cares, I got 16 when browsing runes and I find it useful to be able to jump in a lobby when I am done
